content: another unique tunisian crochet project using the tunisian knit stitch and the tunisian reverse stitch the stitch pattern is one of my favorites and the best part the stitch pattern is designed to avoid that curling so often associated with tunisian crochet >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
